doc:
Clare-Hope Ashitey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clare-Hope_Ashitey 0 Clare-Hope Naa K. Ashitey (born 12 February 1987) is an English actress. She attended the Centre Stage School of Performing Arts, Southgate. while being educated at The Latymer School, located in the Edmonton area of London, for seven years. She took a gap year between school and university to work on the film Children of Men (2006). In 2018, she starred in the Netflix Original crime drama series Seven Seconds. Clare-Hope_Naa_K._Ashitey ( born 12_February_1987 ) is an_English_actress . She attended the_Centre_Stage_School of Performing_Arts , Southgate . while being_educated at The_Latymer_School , located in the_Edmonton_area of London , for seven_years . She took a_gap_year between school_and_university to_work on the_film_Children of Men_(_2006_) . In 2018 , she starred in the_Netflix_Original_crime_drama_series Seven_Seconds .
